Required_Skills: Strong understanding of software development lifecycles and cloud technologies (Oracle, AWS, Azure, etc.)
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and modern delivery frameworks
Responsibilities: Lead end-to-end project delivery from planning through execution
Collaborate with developers, engineers, product managers, and stakeholders
Align technical solutions with business goals
Promote Agile, DevOps, and CI/CD best practices

Qualifications: 10-12 years of proven experience managing technical projects or programs
